divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work at around 4:45am. Noticed what I thought was an air plane fly across the hwy, it got above the field to the side of the hwy I was on. I pulled over and watched it decend down while fly back over to the hwy right over my car. The first time I saw it the only reason I noticed it was because it was hovering over the bridge like just above it making it maybe 100 ft above my car. Literally freaked me out a bit and then I kept seeing it more and more. I've seen it at least 15 times since August. A few of my coworkers have seen it too. Not really sure what it was but its definitely an un-identified craft. It looks like the same craft seen in KC in July of this year.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hazelwood
There were no other sightings in Hazelwood on or around November 6th 2012
Summary: I have seen this several times over the past few months all around the same time
